channel.title: IIS on David Triana
channel.description: Recent content in IIS on David Triana

item.title: Missing management server delegation, 401 error and 403.14 error when deploying a new IIS7.5 for Web Deploy and ASP.NET MVC 2/3
item.description: Last night I was setting up a new box for a web site migration and lost a lot of time with that 3 issues. I used Web Platform Installer to setup most of the server hoping that it will leave everything working as expected, however I found that is not the case. First I needed to setup the Web Deploy service to install the web application from visual studio, however the Web Platform Installer leaves a few things missing when it deals with the Web Deploy.
